name: Sample Dictionary
description: A small sample dictionary that acts as an example of the dictionary format.

cat.definition: A small furry carnivorous mammal with 4 limbs and a tail.

relationships.description: Cats are sometimes afraid of dogs.

cat.definition: A Unix command that prints the contents of a file to standard output.

mouse.definition: A tiny furry mammal that scurries around and enjoys cheese.
A computer periphreal that allows a user to move a pointer on screen in 2 dimensions.

dog.definition: A small furry mammal that barks and loves playing with humans.
